SCTX:
begin MerynScript

float timer
short mistakes
float missCounter
short nolore

if ( MenuMode == 1 )
	Return
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex "MS_Performers" == 10 )
	set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed
	if ( timer >= 120 )
		Journal "MS_Performers" 20
	endif
endif

if ( mistakes == 1 )
	set missCounter to missCounter + 1
	set mistakes to 0
	MessageBox, "You made a mistake!"
endif

End
